content.headline: What's on
content.description: Today's programme guide. Click on a highlighted programme to pursue travel to a choice, related location; or search for your programme directly.
content.locationEnticement: Find out more about a related location

content.flightsInfoDescription: Search for a departure airport or let us look for an airport near you. We'll then look for an upcoming, connecting flight to an airport near {0}.
content.flightsApiDisclaimer: This site uses a free tier of the Amadeus api. Information is available for a limited number of existing airports. We find the nearest airports to a specific location from within that subset. The airports returned, therefore, may in fact be distant from the specified locations.
